metadata.name: Generate Contract Kit
metadata.shortDescription: Collect OpenAPI, specifications, SDK, and tests into a consumer-ready contract-kit with examples and scenario walkthroughs.
metadata.description: Select the latest demand artifacts (functional spec + OpenAPI + optional SDK + tests) and produce a self-contained contract-kit bundle with an artifact inventory, quickstart, simple code examples (curl + one chosen language), and an engaging multi-endpoint scenario walkthrough.
objectives: Collect and inventory the latest OpenAPI and specification artifacts
Snapshot the generated SDK and test suites into the kit when present
Provide simple request examples (curl + one additional language)
Provide an engaging scenario walkthrough with multiple roundtrip calls
metadata.author: OLAF Framework
